title: 4a 5g call quality problem
content:
hi
i have a weird issue with my phone.

i live in cottbus germany. and i have winsim simcard

i have no problem calling my friends almost in all locations.
but when i'm in my home, when i call my friends, they say they can't hear me and my sound is clipping and has a lot of noise.
i tried 5g 4g 3g and 2g settings and turning off 4g calling but it doesn't helped.
only sometimes ( 1 in 5 ) they say my sound is ok.
also signal strength is high.

i have no problem with my huawei mate 10 and same simcard in same location and call quality is great.
also my friends have no issues at all in my home.
so i think it's not operator problem.
please help
tnx
